potions.name: Vitalis Potion
potions.description: Immune to movement restrictions (Slow, Immobilize), increases Control Resistance by 86 and Control Reduction by 30% for 9s

potions.name: Enhanced Vitalis Potion
potions.description: Immune to movement restrictions (Slow, Immobilize), increases Control Resistance by 143 and Control Reduction by 45% for 9s

potions.name: Advanced Vitalis Potion
potions.description: Immune to movement restrictions (Slow, Immobilize), increases Control Resistance by 190 and Control Reduction by 60% for 9s

potions.name: Titan Potion
potions.description: Grows in size and grants Forced Movement immunity (Knockback, Pull), boosts HP by 96%, and increases both Armor and Magic Resistance by 60 for 6s.

potions.name: Enhanced Titan Potion
potions.description: Grows in size and grants Forced Movement immunity (Knockback, Pull), boosts HP by 159%, and increases both Armor and Magic Resistance by 96 for 6s.

potions.name: Advanced Titan Potion
potions.description: Grows in size and grants Forced Movement immunity (Knockback, Pull), boosts HP by 211%, and increases both Armor and Magic Resistance by 124 for 6s.

potions.name: Psyche Infusion
potions.description: Restores 2.9% MP every second and increases skill cooldown rate by 30% for 9s

potions.name: Enhanced Psyche Infusion
potions.description: Restores 4.8% MP every second and increases skill cooldown rate by 40% for 9s

potions.name: Advanced Psyche Infusion
potions.description: Restores 6.4% MP every second and increases skill cooldown rate by 50% for 9s

potions.name: Enhanced Warding Potion
potions.description: Use to instantly remove all debuffs and DoT effects from self, restore 25% HP. Increases Healing Received by 150% for 6s

potions.name: Advanced Warding Potion
potions.description: Use to instantly remove all debuffs and DoT effects from self, restore 30% HP. Increases Healing Received by 200% for 6s

potions.name: Stealth Potion
potions.description:
Use to enter Stealth for 8s.
Using a skill, dealing or taking damage, or inflicting healing breaks Stealth.

potions.name: Mass Haste Matrix
potions.description: Increases Movement Speed by 60% for allies within a certain range around the caster, lasting 9s.

potions.name: Instant Aid Vial
potions.description: Use to instantly restore 16% Max HP plus 1600 HP.

potions.name: Aegis Draught
potions.description: Use to remove and gain immunity to Damage Over Time and Debuff effects. For 6s, immune to damage, Damage Over Time, Debuffs, and Control, while dealing 50% reduced damage.

potions.name: Enhanced Frost Potion
potions.description:
Using this grants Frozen and unable to act, gains [Target-based Max HP 150%] Shield for 6s. If the shield exists, Recovers
[Target-based Max HP 7%] HP per second.. This ability can still be used even when skills are disabled.
